decks.notes: The main focus of this Dimir Tempo deck is to disrupt the opponent's game plan while applying pressure with efficient threats. By utilizing a combination of disruption spells like Thoughtseize, Force of Will, and Daze, the deck aims to control the board and protect its key threats like Murktide Regent and Kaito, Bane of Nightmares. The deck also features card draw and selection tools like Brainstorm and Ponder to find the necessary pieces. The deck's mana base includes Wasteland to disrupt the opponent's mana base and maximize its own tempo advantage.

The deck revolves around using Show and Tell to cheat powerful creatures like Emrakul, the Aeons Torn and Atraxa, Grand Unifier onto the battlefield quickly. It also incorporates cards like Sneak Attack and Omniscience to further accelerate the combo potential. The deck includes counterspells like Force of Will and disruption like Daze to protect the combo. Additionally, there are cards like Brainstorm and Ponder for card selection and manipulation. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with big creatures and win the game quickly before the opponent can respond effectively.

The deck focuses on assembling the Dark Depths combo, which involves using Thespian's Stage to copy Dark Depths and create a 20/20 Marit Lage token. The deck includes cards like Knight of the Reliquary, Green Sun's Zenith, and Crop Rotation to tutor for the combo pieces. It also includes cards like Elvish Reclaimer and Mox Diamond to ramp up and accelerate the combo. The deck utilizes land destruction with cards like Wasteland and Ghost Quarter to disrupt the opponent's game plan and protect the combo with cards like Sylvan Safekeeper and Maze of Ith.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly fill your graveyard with Dredge cards like Golgari Grave-Troll and Stinkweed Imp using cards like Faithless Looting and Careful Study. This allows you to trigger powerful effects such as Bridge from Below and Narcomoeba, while also generating a large number of Zombie tokens. In combination with cards like Lion's Eye Diamond and Dread Return, you can bring back powerful creatures like Ox of Agonas for explosive plays. The use of cards like Cabal Therapy helps disrupt your opponent's game plan and protect your combo.

The focus of this deck is to maintain control over the game tempo through a combination of aggressive creatures like Barrowgoyf and Murktide Regent, disruption spells like Daze and Thoughtseize, and powerful card draw and selection with cards like Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student and Brainstorm. By efficiently disrupting the opponent's game plan while quickly deploying threats of its own, the deck aims to apply pressure and dictate the pace of the game in its favor, leading to a swift victory.

The main concept of this deck is to disrupt your opponent's game plan while establishing a fast and aggressive tempo. By utilizing cards like Force of Will, Daze, and Thoughtseize, you can control the battlefield and protect your threats. Murktide Regent and Orcish Bowmasters serve as powerful creatures that can quickly close out the game. Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student provides card advantage and helps you dig through your deck for the cards you need. Overall, this deck aims to be proactive and efficient in applying pressure while disrupting your opponent's strategy.

This deck aims to control the board and disrupt the opponent's strategy while applying consistent pressure with efficient creatures and powerful disruptive spells. The deck leverages the tempo advantage of Dimir colors to keep opponents on the back foot while using powerful cards like Thoughtseize and Force of Will to disrupt their game plan. By utilizing a combination of disruption, card advantage, and efficient threats, this deck looks to quickly outpace and overwhelm opponents in the Legacy format.

The main focus of this Eldrazi Aggro deck is to quickly establish a board presence with powerful Eldrazi creatures and disrupt the opponent's strategy with cards like Chalice of the Void and Wasteland. By utilizing mana acceleration like Lotus Petal and Ancient Tomb, the deck can cast threats like Reality Smasher and Thought-Knot Seer ahead of schedule. The inclusion of Eye of Ugin allows the deck to search for more Eldrazi creatures, making it a formidable and aggressive force in Legacy 1 vs 1 matches.

This deck aims to assemble the Painter's Servant and Grindstone combo to mill the opponent's entire deck in one turn. It utilizes various artifact tutors and artifact recursion to find and protect the combo pieces. Other cards like Pyroblast and Red Elemental Blast provide disruption and protection against opposing spells, while cards like Karn, the Great Creator and Goblin Cratermaker offer additional removal and utility. The deck is fast and efficient, looking to win the game quickly by executing its powerful combo.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly establish board presence and overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures that have built-in protection and evasion. The deck aims to use mana acceleration cards like Ancient Tomb, Chrome Mox, and Simian Spirit Guide to cast powerful creatures like Broadside Bombardiers and Chancellor of the Annex as early as possible. The inclusion of Cavern of Souls ensures that the creatures are difficult to counter, while Wasteland helps disrupt the opponent's mana base. The deck also utilizes Once Upon a Time to find key creatures or lands, maintaining pressure throughout the game.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly and efficiently combo off by putting all of your spells onto the battlefield without casting any creatures. By utilizing cards like Balustrade Spy and Undercity Informer to mill your entire library, you can win the game with Thassa's Oracle or Fell the Profane as your finisher. This deck aims to execute its combo as early as possible, disrupting opponents with hand disruption spells like Thoughtseize and Duress along the way to ensure victory.

This deck focuses on using cards like Show and Tell, Sneak Attack, and Omniscience to cheat powerful creatures like Emrakul, the Aeons Torn into play quickly and unexpectedly. By ramping up mana with Lotus Petal and Ancient Tomb, and utilizing control cards like Force of Will and Spell Pierce to protect the combo, the deck aims to overwhelm opponents with massive threats before they can react. Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student helps to dig for combo pieces, while Atraxa, Grand Unifier provides additional utility and support. Ultimately, the goal is to win the game in a single explosive turn.

The main concept of this Eldrazi Aggro deck is to quickly disrupt the opponent's strategy with cards like Chalice of the Void and Thought-Knot Seer, while also capitalizing on heavy hitters like Reality Smasher and It That Heralds the End. The deck aims to apply pressure early with aggressive creatures like Eldrazi Linebreaker and Glaring Fleshraker, while also utilizing powerful lands such as Eldrazi Temple and Ancient Tomb to ramp up fast mana. The deck's strategy focuses on overwhelming the opponent with a combination of disruptive threats and efficient mana utilization.

The main concept of this Legacy combo storm deck is to quickly generate mana and disrupt the opponent's hand with cards like Duress and Thoughtseize. By using cards like Dark Ritual, Chrome Mox, and Lotus Petal, the deck aims to cast powerful spells like Tendrils of Agony and Ad Nauseam to win the game. Wishclaw Talisman and Burning Wish provide additional versatility and access to key combo pieces. The deck is designed to efficiently and explosively execute its game plan while also incorporating alternate win conditions to adapt to different matchups.

The deck focuses on using aggressive creatures to pressure the opponent while disrupting their game plan with cards like Thoughtseize and Skyclave Apparition. It also utilizes the synergy between creatures and equipment to gain an advantage. The inclusion of Yorion as a companion adds consistency and value to the deck. The mana base is optimized for color consistency and efficient use of cards like Wasteland. Overall, the deck aims to apply early pressure and disrupt the opponent's strategy to come out ahead in the match.

This deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan by using disruptive spells like Thoughtseize and Hymn to Tourach while applying pressure with efficient creatures like Murktide Regent and Orcish Bowmasters. The deck leverages powerful tempo plays by utilizing cards like Daze and Force of Will to protect its threats. Additionally, the deck has access to removal spells like Fatal Push and Snuff Out to deal with opposing threats. Overall, the deck's strategy revolves around disrupting the opponent's plan while applying pressure to secure a quick victory.
